for free you only get 2 downloads a day, whatever i download more and its like $5 USD for a lifetime im pretty sure so i did that, this app downloads alot more than just youtube too if you use external links. i see people complaining about the updates, they happen like once a month but its not the the app itself the updates are for the download engine to add support for sites and other issues. they take like less than 10 seconds for me usually, its really not an issue. pretty much anyone here that complains legit just know very little about the app and linux in general and their issues seem like user error. 100% recomend buying this app!
